title: (x) Eric Gill book font - (similar to) ITC Golden Cockerel {Mark S}
author: apocalypso

comments.content: [ITC Golden Cockerel](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-golden-cockerel/golden-cockerel-titling-itc/testdrive.html?s=FOURGOSPELSOFTHE&p=48) was based on this. I don't think the original was ever released in anything but metal.
